channel.title: Mero
channel.description: A collection of points of view, opinions, suggestions and completely random thoughts by Pedro Pinto.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Ever since I started to work, I felt like there were little things I would like to share and ramble about. A few years later I even stumbled upon a Medium article that got me into a life-changing experience. I wanted to talk about it. I wanted to share the whole experience so that someone else could benefit from the same I had benefited by reading that article.
